name: WordPress Multisite Content Copier/Updater
author: Obtain Infotech

sections.description:
WordPress Multisite Content Copier/Updater plugin is the best solution for copy/update posts and pages from one site (blog) to the other sites (blogs) in your WordPress Multisite Network.

Features

  • Copy/Update posts and pages from one site to the other sites in your WordPress Multisite Network.
  • Copy/Update posts.
  • Copy/Update pages.
  • Copy/Update terms (Categories and Tags) when post copy/update.
  • Copy/Update parents posts, pages, tags and categories automatically.
  • Copy/Update media (image, document file, etc…) when post or page copy/update.
  • Bulk copy/update posts/pages from one site to the other sites.

PRO Features

  • Copy/Update custom post type posts.
  • Copy/Update users.
  • Automatically copy/update custom terms when post, page, custom post type post copy/update.
  • Automatically copy/update media (image, document file, etc…) when post, page, custom post type post copy/update.
  • Exclude Meta Data (posts, pages and custom post type posts) option: Exclude meta data when copy/update with web sites.
  • Bulk copy/update posts, pages, custom post type posts and users from one site to the other sites.
  • Also support custom fields which is in posts, pages and custom post type posts.

Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) plugin and Custom Fields Support: Copy/Update custom fields which is in posts, pages and custom post type posts.

Upgrade to Pro Now

Others WordPress Multisite Network Sites Plugins

  • WordPress Multisite Posts, Pages and Custom Post Type Posts Sync
  • WooCommerce Multisite Product Sync
  • WordPress Multisite User Sync/Unsync
  • WooCommerce Multisite Content Copier/Updater
  • Multisite Shared Media for WordPress

WordPress API Based Sync Plugins (WordPress Single Separate Sites)

  • WordPress API Posts and Pages Sync with Multiple WordPress Sites
  • WordPress API Multiple Sites User Sync
  • WooCommerce API Product Sync with Multiple WooCommerce Stores (Shops)

Usage

Bulk Copy/Update: You can copy/update bulk posts/pages (public, private and future) from one site to the other sites. Please follow the below steps.

  • Go to ‘Network Admin’ -> ‘Content Copier’ -> ‘Bulk Copy/Update’ OR ‘Network Admin’ -> ‘WMCC’ -> ‘Bulk Copy/Update’.
  • You will see WP Multisite Content Copier page.
  • Select content type (posts or pages).
  • Select source site you want copy/update from.
  • Add number of records per page.
  • Click on ‘Filter’ button.
  • You will see list of records.
  • Select records you want copy/update.
  • Select destination sites you want copy/update.
  • Select extra option like Copy or update media, Copy or update terms (Categories & Tags).
  • Click on ‘Copy/Update’ button.

Individual Copy/Update: You can copy/update individual posts/pages (public, private and future) from one site to the other sites. Please follow the below steps.

  • Edit any post/page.
  • You will see ‘WP Multisite Content Copier: Copy/Update Content’ section.
  • Select destination sites you want copy/update.
  • Select extra option like Copy or update media, Copy or update terms (Categories & Tags).
  • Click on ‘Copy/Update’ button.
sections.installation:
This plugin only works with WordPress Multisite, will not work in a single site, and must be network activated.

  • Multi-domains. For example: example.site1, example.site2
  • Sub-domains. For example: site1.example.com, site2.example.com
  • Sub-directories. For example: example.com/site1, example.com/site2

WordPress Multisite Network Dashboard

  1. Go to ‘Network Admin’ -> ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Add New’.
  2. Click on ‘Upload Plugin’.
  3. Upload plugin zip.
  4. Activate plugin.

FTP, SFTP, SCP etc…

  1. Unzip plugin zip.
  2. Upload the unzip plugin folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…).
  3. Go to ‘Network Admin’ -> ‘Plugins’.
  4. Activate plugin.

1.5.0

  • Security release.

1.4.0

  • Maintenance release.

1.3.0

  • Maintenance release.

1.2.1

  • Add support for copy post with actual created date.

1.1.0

  • Fixed version compatibility.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

sections.reviews:
Absolutely amazing!

By Aimee (greatdanemaniac) on October 24, 2023

This is not a plugin. This is pure internet magic. Huge thanks for this. I wish I'd known about it years ago. So much better than the export/import feature.

Useful plugin

By KS (karl19) on May 26, 2023

This plugin had useful functions when we split off part of our main site, and moved some pages and content to a subsite.

Does not seem to work with Elementor

By Maxime Freschard (djsuperfive) on February 14, 2023

The Elementor content/layout is broken in the copied page.

good

By pettrushkov on May 9, 2022

good, but I can't copy posts from CPT

Simply the best

By Janko Harej (jankoharej) on August 13, 2021

A service we've used for 3 years now. Well worth it. Thanks!

Spaghetticode mit einigen Bugs

By Skrabbel on August 1, 2021

Das Plugin sieht auf den ersten Blick gut aus. In einem Test zeigten sich gravierende Schwächen. Beim Sync wurden einige Teile von Posts und Co. zufällig durcheinander gewürfelt. Beim Debugging zeigte sich sein rechter Spaghetticode. ACF-Felder werden gar nur manchmal berücksichtigt.

Outstanding

By Nate Walker (1791delegates) on July 19, 2021

Obtain Infotech plugins have been a game-changer for our multisite. Outstanding technical support and expertise.

Works like a charm!

By Rachel Rowling (taqtik) on June 4, 2021

I have a multi-site network with 5 sub-domain and large databases. This plugin worked like a charm. I will probably upgrade to the PRO version for custom post types. Thank you. Rachel

Simple way to create a copy

By Renaat (rsioncke) on May 28, 2020

Simple way to create a copy of post, pages, and more.

Code Quality

By Elena Caramanico (elenacaramanico) on February 24, 2020

Set-up under five minutes...Awesome job !
